mapper.sql: o.ID, o.C_COMMUNITY_ID, o.C_USE_STATUS, o.C_TYPE, o.C_CHECK_STATUS, o.C_PRICE, o.C_PERCENT, o.C_NO
mapper.select: SELECT FROM member_space o WHERE o.C_COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId} ORDER BY o.C_CHECK_STATUS,o.C_USE_STATUS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_space ( C_COMMUNITY_ID, C_USE_STATUS, C_TYPE, C_CHECK_STATUS, C_PRICE, C_PERCENT, C_NO ) VALUES ( #{communityId}, #{useStatus}, #{type}, #{checkStatus}, #{price}, #{percent}, #{no} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_space SET C_COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId}, C_USE_STATUS = #{useStatus}, C_TYPE = #{type}, C_CHECK_STATUS = #{checkStatus}, C_PRICE = #{price}, C_PERCENT = #{percent}, C_NO = #{no} WHERE ID = #{id}
